brainly_data.question: Someone who brags about his physical health and vitality in front of a friend going through chemotherapy exhibits a symptom of which personality disorder
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.question: Someone who brags about his physical health and vitality in front of a friend going through chemotherapy exhibits a symptom of which personality disorder
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text: A per Son WHO EXHIBITS A SYSTOM OF A PERSONALITY DISORDER IS NARCISSISM.
